Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: pilot-E-master-patient-widget-wirecloud
Catalog.ResourceDescription.DisplayName: Pilot E Master Patient Widget Wirecloud
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Martin Scholl (cismet)
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This wrapper for the Pilot E Master Patient Widget mainly serves as an example on how to integrate existing angular modules in wirecloud.

InputEndpoint.name: setSelectedPatient
InputEndpoint.label: Select a patient
InputEndpoint.description: Let's other widgets select a specific patient. The text has to be a resource uri so that the patient can actually be loaded

InputEndpoint.name: setPatients
InputEndpoint.label: Sets all the available patients
InputEndpoint.description: The dataset to operate on. The text has to be a resource uri so that the patients can actually be loaded

OutputEndpoint.name: getSelectedPatient
OutputEndpoint.label: Get the currently selected patient
OutputEndpoint.description: Let's other widgets know which patient is selected. The text is a resource uri so that the patient can actually be loaded

OutputEndpoint.name: getPatients
OutputEndpoint.label: Gets all the available patients
OutputEndpoint.description: The dataset currently operated on. The text is a resource uri so that the patients can actually be loaded
